creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund, 1969
description: 29 loose sheets of different sizes (some folded) with text, drawings, photographs, collages, reliefs, letterpress, off-set, die cuts and embossing; parts of text blacked out on some images; printed cardboard outer folder with colored bars on top, photographic image on back with figures whited out
dimension: 10 x 9 1/8 x 3/8 in. (25.4 x 23.18 x 0.95 cm) (folder, closed)
